ASCII Art Test File

This file contains examples of ASCII art to test detection.

Example 1: Box drawing
┌─────────────────────┐
│  Box with borders   │
├─────────────────────┤
│  Another section    │
└─────────────────────┘

Example 2: Simple ASCII art
  /\_/\
 ( o.o )
  > ^ <

Example 3: Table with ASCII characters
+----------+----------+----------+
| Header 1 | Header 2 | Header 3 |
+----------+----------+----------+
| Cell 1   | Cell 2   | Cell 3   |
+----------+----------+----------+

Example 4: Banner
 *********************************
 *  IMPORTANT NOTICE             *
 *  Please read carefully        *
 *********************************

Example 5: Complex ASCII art
    /\___/\
   /       \
  |  o   o  |
  |    ^    |
  |   \_/   |
   \_______/

Example 6: Flow chart arrows
  [Start] --> [Process] --> [Decision]
              /       \
            Yes        No
             |          |
          [Action]  [End]

Example 7: Unicode box drawing
╔═══════════════════╗
║  Double borders   ║
╠═══════════════════╣
║  Section 2        ║
╚═══════════════════╝
